question: Iranaitivu is an island situated in which country?
explanation:
Iranaitivu is an island belonging to Sri Lanka located in the Gulf of Mannar. It is located 300 km away from the countryâ€™s capital, Colombo.
This remote island was recently chosen as the burial site for COVID-19 victims belonging to Islamic and Christian communities. The Sri Lankan government had previously forced minorities to cremate their dead.
